visualizations.label: Predominent tags
visualizations.query: SELECT id, entries, mood from ? ORDER BY entries DESC limit 10

visualizations.label: Positive tags
visualizations.query: SELECT id, entries, mood from ? where mood > 0 ORDER BY mood DESC limit 10

visualizations.label: Negative tags
visualizations.query: SELECT id, entries, mood from ? where mood < 0 ORDER BY mood ASC limit 10
